replies.body: Why no Super Galaxy Rumble on the Early Sale list? Please add him Riot!
Maybe once you understand what the early sales are, you will understand why you will never see it on the early sales list.

Try to be a little less harsh. Maybe actually explain WHY it will never be on Early sales?

Early Sales are for recently released skins to go on a "mini"sale before they would be eligible for normal sales. (depending on the $kin$ it can take well over a year for a normal sale).

Skins that cost 1820 and up are not included in the normal sales.

Super Galaxy Rumble is an older skin, and costs 1820, so it is long past any 'early sale', and will not be included in any normal sale.
Thank you, Grarrrg

> Try to be a little less harsh. Maybe actually explain WHY it will never be on Early sales? 

What? A teen be sensible on the internet? 

That's preposterous! Everyone knows you have to be an edgelord in front of your peers!
lol
You had a moment to be helpful to someone in the community and you blew it. Way. To. Go. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
How is solving half the puzzle rude? Who wants to be told exactly how everything works all the time? Leaving a little something to the imagination can be much more rewarding, can it not?
Um... no, it sucks to be left in the dark.
That wasn't even rude.
Yeah, how dare you ask a perfectly reasonable question that any new player might not know the answer to.
Super Galaxy Rumble was released years ago, therefore he is not on the early sale list with all the other super galaxy skins
Looks like i will Bee spending money on that skin, beecause i definitely play singed. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Boooo go home {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Don't you mean "Buzz off"? ;)
ahhhhhh I missed my chance {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I am still awaiting the Rune page sale, I don't have time to start from total scratch each time.  If I had 5 pages I could at least have the correct Tree selected at the start.
I just have a Google Doc full of all the runes I would use for each character, so I can switch out runes in champ select easily and quickly so it's not a problem. It helps

My problem is my computer has issues
For Example: I have about 3 to 5 seconds to ban.  
If I have a page with a correct tree I can usually update it fast enough, but swapping Trees seems to give me additional lag before I can select any runes.
Is owning every single skin in this schedule normal?
OMGOMgoMGoMoMGoMGo FiNALLY THE SUPER GALAXY SKINS,,,, BLESS
add udder skins plz :){{champion:77}}
udder
Will they put Draven Draven on sale for April Fools?
Cool to see that Dark Star Varus, Special Weapon Zac and Overlord Malzahar (the latter two of which I own) are on sale. Maybe I'll pick up DSV but we'll see. Regardless though thanks for the sales.

Pls...Guys Can some one answer me When `ll April Early Sales 2018 come up Because we are at the end of the month And it `s not avilable yet Pls i need an answer I`m so Exciting to know And thanks alot <3

It should be coming soon. Remember, the Star Guardian Early Sales from February was on February 28th, that's pretty late. I'm pretty sure it's coming in a few days and it's gonna last until early May :)
Did the April sales already pass?
please have blood moon talon in next month's sales! thanks
Super Galaxy Kindred?? {{champion:203}}
And fizz and shyvana?
Wait, isn't Snow Day Bard a Legacy Skin? Why is that on the list? Is that some poor attempt at an April Fools joke?
No, snowday bard isn't a legacy skin. You can still buy it right now.
pretty good skins this month :){{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

man i hate riot i had a glitch where my shop wouldnt work so i thought that the shop was gone and i had shockblade zed 40% off and i used all my rp on shockblade without discount and my other skns like bloodmoon talon 50% off

>
> man i hate riot i had a glitch where my shop wouldnt work so i thought that the shop was gone and i had shockblade zed 40% off and i used all my rp on shockblade without discount and my other skns like bloodmoon talon 50% off

Contact Support and maybe (keyword: maybe) they'll be able to help you out with this. Other than that all I can say is try to be a little more careful in the future and make sure that you're actually purchasing an on-sale item before-hand.
